column1: short and wide leg break, he is back and cutting firmly behind point and it finds the gap and races away! Bad ball first up
short again, off the back foot he punches it in the air just over Curran at mid on! He just got the timing of his attempt to jump horribly wrong! Two boundaries in two
wrong un outside off, he chops a cut to point
another drag down wrong un, Stoinis is back and thumping this over midwicket! Too easy
slider pushed through, he's back and punching this firmly to mid on
he miscues another pull shot at again it just clears Curran at mid on! Again he got the timing of his jump wrong! He might have had a chance to get hands to both balls that were struck at him!
130kph, good length outswinger, he's back and punching this into the off side
132kph, fuller length outswinger, he defends on the front foot and opens the face to run it to third man
133kph, short into the hip, it comes off the thigh pad and runs fine but the keeper makes the save
134kph, back of a length on middle, he's back and defending on his toes
132kph, back of a length, jamming him up on the back foot, he just fends it away jumping onto the back foot

nearly a catch to midwicket, but another pull shot finds the gap! 137kph, chest high short ball, he pulls but not out of the middle of the bat, the man dives but it's just wide and it runs to the midwicket fence
dropped at gully by Lyon! He was very close. Dunk slices a drive off the outside edge, Lyon jumps up and gets both hands to it but can't hold on!
full on the pads, he glances fine but straight to short fine leg on the circle
138kph, good length on off, he defends with an open face to point

caught at deep square! It was a back of a length ball on the hip, he flicks this off the hip high in the air to the long boundary but not long enough, Pope is out there and he takes the catch 15m off the rope
134kph, good length, top of off, he's back and defending on the back foot
131kph, good length, fourth stump line, he pushes firmly on the front foot to cover
128kph, good length, fourth stump line, he drives neatly towards mid off
129kph, good length on off, he's defending from the crease with the full face towards mid on
130kph, short and wide and it was cracked to point and Pope makes a great save to knock it down, saving three
top edged pull flies miles in the air and lands safely at fine leg, one bounce four! He was beaten by extra bounce, fine leg was inside the circle and he couldn't get back to it.
133kph, good length wide of off, he drives on the up to cover
131kph, fuller on off, he drives to mid on and takes on Vince, he charges in gathers and throws in the one action and misses at the non-striker's but Handscomb would have been out if he hit!
good length on leg stump, he works this to midwicket
133kph back of a length, wide of off, he's back and across and trying to work awkwardly to square leg and misses
133kph, shorter length outside off, he leans back and late cuts to cully
short and wide and he cuts just past Lyon at backward point, Lyon got a touch on it but the outfield is so quick it still gets to the rope!
130kph, back of a length outside off, he stands up on the back foot and defends to cover-point
he advances and misses. It was back of a length try and he tried cut it on the charge
back of a length, outside off, he's back and across and defending on the back foot
126kph, shorter on the hip, he glances off the back foot to short fine leg, there's some slight hesitation but they get through in the end for one
133kph, shorter outside off, he steps back and across, working this through square leg to the sweeper
137kph, back of a length on off, he's back and working to midwicket
he charges at a bouncer and smashes a pull shot straight to deep square leg. He hit that so well
short ball and he hangs back and slaps a straight pull shot high over mid on! What power Stoinis possesses to muscle that straight
tossed up slowly on off, he skips down and works it against the turn to long on
good length on middle, he sits back and bunts this towards long on
he advances, this is tossed up outside off, he defends on the move to cover
he gets a leading edge trying to work this against the turn but it flies safely wide of the bowler to long off
shorter and wider, he tries to cut but gets a thick bottom edge
nearly chopped on! This was short again but tighter to off and sliding on, he cuts but gets a thick inside edge past leg stump
117kph, slower ball, he skips down and drives to mid off and takes one
full outside off, he hammers a drive really hard at mid off and Henriques misfields, it almost runs to the rope, Silk comes across to save it, he does well
131kph, angled down leg, he glances it fine and finds the rope! Beautifully done. Bad ball

top edge straight up caught by Philippe! It was just short of a length, he tried to pull over midwicket, it wasn't short enough, he gets a top edge straight, Philippe moves to his right and nervously stands under it and holds on! He has dropped a couple of sky balls in this tournament but he got that one.
good length, 132kph, top of off, he pushes firmly back to the bowler
back of a length on off, he's back and working this to the gap at square leg
85kph, tossed up to off, he defends on the front foot to point
advances down the track and drives nicely to long off
good length on off, he pushes on the front foot to midwicket
good length off break on off, he defends on the front foot
flatter outside off, he mistimes a drive to cover
shorter length on middle and leg, he is back and working this through forward square and they run brilliantly to get a couple
he skips down and lofts this beautifully down the ground straight to the sight screen! Lovely footwork and a great stroke
shorter outside off, he sits back and late cuts very fine but no pace to beat the short third man
81kph, shorter and wider, it pinned Maxwell to the crease and he let it go hoping for a wide call and he got it
short and wide, he's back and cutting hard to deep point
83kph, tossed up outside off, he dances down and drives to long off
77kph drifting into leg, he works this against the turn through square leg to the gap and they run well to get two
fuller outside off, he drives on the rise to cover
shorter outside leg, he backs away and cuts nicely behind square placing it well for two
gives room early, he fires full and wide and Handscomb square drives to deep point
good length on leg, he's back and giving room to slap it to long off
he advances and it's fired into the heels, he clips this out to deep midwicket
slower on leg, he tucks this behind square for a single
he skips down, not quite to the pitch and just chips this over the bowler's head safely to straight long on
shorter leg break, he's back and pulling hard to deep midwicket
short drag down but it stays a touch low, he pulls hard to deep square leg
short ball, he's back and hammering this flat to long off
tossed up, he slog sweeps flat to deep midwicket but it lands just short of the fielder
shorter on off, he's back and flat batting this down the ground, great shot, Abbott stretches on the rope and can't quite make the save! Abbott looks sore too after that dive
wrong un, shorter, he's back and punching this in the air towards long off but it lands well short of him
full outside off, he reaches out and sweeps to deep forward square
slower and wider, he winds up and slaps this straight to cover
good length outside off, he cuts firmly to deep point

caught at wide long off! He looped this outside off, slower and wider, Handscomb advanced early and went leg side, he had to reach out and chip this but didn't hit it far enough or wide enough of Vince running around from long off and he takes a good catch
tossed up on leg, he works this against the turn to long on
tossed up outside off, he works this with a closed face back to the bowler
136kph, full on off, he stays back and pushes slowly straight of mid off
137kph, good length outside off, he tries to drive on the up, gets a thick inside edge onto pad
fuller on off, 136kph, he's hanging back a touch and mistiming a drive back to the bowler
131kph, shorter length into the hip, gets an inside edge onto body and it rolls behind square for a single
mistimes a pull shot and it balloons just over the man running back from midwicket! They get two
shorter length outside off, he's back and defending this close into the off side and they pinch one
shorter length, he's back and defending back to the bowler
shorter outside off, he's back and cutting straight to backward point
fuller on off, he pushes on the front foot to the gap at cover-point
a switch hit! He sets up early but mistimes it behind point for a single
good length on middle, he's back and dabbing this to backward point
shorter length, it spins and bounces a touch, he mistimes a pull through midwicket and Maxwell's running is superb to get back for two
full on middle, he mistimes a drive to mid off who is on the circle
good length outside off, he drives on the up straight to mid off
angled into leg stump, he glances to short fine leg
he gives room and lofts this inside out over wide mid off! Finally a pressure releasing stroke. Mid off was up and Maddinson did well to loft this over the man
slower ball in the slot, he lofts this over mid off again and gets it even better this time! Well struck, one bounce four.
caught at deep square leg! It was full and on leg stump, he whips this with the bottom hand in the air straight to deep forward square and Abbott is there to take the simple catch
short ball, he's back and pulling hard to the gap at deep square and he gets two
advances and launches this over long on! Brilliant footwork! He skipped down to get to the pitch and swing through the line with the turn
shorter he's back and smashing this pull shot wide of long on for four more! Good batting from Maxwell
slower on leg, he knocks this with the turn to midwicket, calls two immediately and gets it

run out! Bravo slipped and lost his footing coming back for two! Maxwell knocked this to the gap at wide long on again and called two. There was an easy two in it, but Bravo tripped over on the way back, lost his bat halfway down, he got up without a bat and dived but was well short when Lyon took the bails off!
fuller on off, he pushes down the ground to long off

Vince parries it for four at deep square leg! Short on the hip, Maxwell flicks this off the hip long to deep square, Vince runs in too far, it gets big on him, he reaches up and parries it into the rope
short and fractionally wide, he gives room and carves this backward of point and it flies away wide of third man!
good length on middle, he defends from the crease
short over middle, he backs away and cuts to backward point
top edge over the keeper! it was short down leg, he steps inside the line, trying to hook it over fine leg, gets a top edge and it flies over the keeper and over the fence!
shorter length on middle, he sits back and works this to midwicket for a single
full toss on the thigh and he flicks this way back over deep square leg into the crowd! What a shot!
full toss outside off, he deliberately opens the face and slices this past short third man! What skills to place that to the gap at backward point
full toss on middle, he opens the face again and slices this behind point wide of the sweeper for two more
short slower ball, he tries to upper cut but it just sticks in the surface and he misses
full toss on middle, he bunts this down to long on, Gotch gets on his bike and sprints back for two
slower ball, he slices a drive to backward point to retain the strike
full toss and Maxwell flat bats this miles! Like a baseballer over left field for a home run! Way back over long on
and again! Full half-volley in the slot, left leg is cleared and he just swings through the line and clubs it over long on!
fuller outside off, he drives firmly to long off
full outside off, he carves this high towards deep point but it lands short of the man
full on off, he sits back and checks this way back over straight long on! Incredible! The ball striking is astonishing! A check drive!
he backs away, Dwarshuis fires a slower ball short and too wide!

skied straight up and Henriques runs in and takes it! It was full in the slot again, he got under this though and hit it straight up, they ran two while it was in the air, Henriques takes the catch running in from mid off to save two runs.
good length on off, he defends this to backward point and takes a tight one
good length, wide of off, he's happy to leave this
fuller outside off, he square drives firmly and it's well fielded at backward point
good length, he's back and across and working this behind square
good length on middle, he defends from the crease as it bounces a little more
good length, on off, he swings this away with a languid ease, high over midwicket and it rolls to the rope!
full outside off, Philippe crunches an on drive, very wristy, it just flies along the ground straight of mid on
back of a length on off, he's giving room and late cutting placing this wide of short third man! It races away
back of a length, outside off, he defends on the back foot back to the bowler
shorter length, he mistimes a pull to midwicket

caught by Bravo running back from mid on! A short ball does the trick! He tried to pull this over midwicket, he scooped it, mistiming it high and wide of mid on, Bravo runs a long way back and to his right and takes a good catch
over-pitched and Hughes play a sumptuous cover-drive! That is a superb stroke just placing it into the gap between cover and mid off
good length wide of off, he runs this off the open face wide of third man, they push for two and get there
good length outside off, he defends on the front foot to cover
full wide yorker, he jams this out to point
short and wide and he leans back and cracks this high and handsomely over cover-point! Super strike!
136kph, good bouncer over off, he shapes to pull but it's too high and called wide. The bowler wasn't happy
caught at mid off! Back of a length outside off, he hangs back and gives room, trying to slap this over mid off, he miscues and it just balloons to DJ Bravo on the circle. Easy catch
139kph, good length climbing into the sticker of the bat as he defends on the front foot
shorter outside off, he's back and punching this to deep cover-point
he steps outside off and sweeps hard dragging it from way outside off and placed it behind square! Sensational shot
he advances to a length ball, gets a little inside edge onto pad that rolls towards point
shorter length outside off, he pushes to point, there's some confusion but Henriques is sent back
darted down leg, it comes off pad and runs fine
caught at short third man! Shorter ball, he went back and tried to hammer a pull shot, he sliced a top edge that floats to short third man and Sandeep is there to take the easy catch!
full on the pads and Hughes tucks it away wide of fine leg for a couple
caught at cover! Slower ball off cutter outside off, he doesn't pick it, plays a lazy drive hitting it in the air to Stoinis at cover. He jumps up and takes the catch above his head!
141kph, bouncer, high outside off and called too high
beaten by a superb 141kph leg cutter outside off. Just flew past the outside edge as he prodded with no footwork
full into leg stump, he whips this easily behind square! Worrall got greedy and over-pitched on leg and Curran glances it away easily
he scoops this in the air towards mid off but it drops short. It was very full and he scooped it out but it landed short of Bravo
good length, he drives on the up, in the air but beautifully timed and placed between cover and mid off! This races to the rope
shorter outside off, he tries to cut off the front foot but mistimes to cover
good length on off, he defends on the front foot, Silk calls for a single but is sent back
slower ball, short and wide, he cuts nicely, placing it behind point wide of third man for a couple
beaten by a 127kph, good length delivery, that climbed a touch outside off
short ball on off, he's back and pulls through square leg to the man in the deep
good length outside off, he punches from the crease to cover
appeal for caught behind! Not out. A slider that skidded on, he went back, it went between bat and pad and past leg stump! Well taken by Handscomb. He didn't hit it
tossed up on middle, he's forward and defending

Stumped! Silk reaches out to drive at a leg break outside off, he missed, he dragged his back foot out, Handscomb whipped the bails off and Silk didn't get his back foot back! The TV umpire double checks but it's out!
shorter length wide of off, he's back and cutting to backward point
tossed up, he square drives to deep point
darted into leg, it slides onto the pad and rolls away
shorter leg break, he's back and working this to the gap at forward square
sharp spinning leg break, he's back and beaten
shorter length, on off, he's back and defending
wrong un outside off, spins back past the inside edge and past off stump! It was too hot for Handscomb to handle and they run a bye

LBW! The wrong un gets him! He didn't pick it. It was a good length, ripped back, hit the front pad infront of off. The umpire took his time but gives it out! It looked pretty good to go on and hit leg stump!
tossed up wide of off, he drags a drive back to the bowler
tossed up on off, he drives to cover

caught at slip! Maxwell with a screamer! Incredible. Shorter leg break, not that wide, he gives room, it hurries him as he cuts, gets a thick edge, it flies to Maxwell quickly, he sticks his left hand out, it hits the left hands, bobbles into the right and he holds on! Wow. He had no time to react. Brilliant from the skipper
looped up on middle and he drives to long off
shorter leg break, he's back and defending
looped up outside off, he drives firmly past cover to the man in the deeper
shorter length, he's back and working this past midwicket
wrong un, pitching outside leg, he drives off a slight leading edge down to long off
ripping leg break fizzes past the edge as he's caught on the crease with no idea which way it's spinning
fuller outside off, he drives firmly to long off
wrong un outside off, he square drives firmly to deep point
shorter length, he's back and cutting to the man at deep cover-point
wrong un, outside off, he presses forward and defends off a thick inside edge to short fine
full toss drifting into leg, he whips hard to deep forward square
tossed up on off, he drives past the bowler, Zampa misfields and the get one
leg break on leg stump, he defends on the front foot
leg break drifting down leg, he pads up to it and doesn't offer a shot
wrong un, he defends off a thick inside edge behind square, they push for two and Sandeep was a little slow to it and they get two
fuller leg break, he drives firmly to long off
fuller on off, leg break, he drives to cover
fuller outside off, he leans out and defends
wrong un, he's back and punching this towards the gap at point

caught at slip! Magnificent from Sandeep! This is a spectacular wrong un, tossed up on off, Dwarshuis thinks it's a leg break, he drives hard, it spins away, catches the edge and Maxwell takes the easy catch
leg break outside off, he tries to sweep, gets taken on the body
tries to sweep again outside off, he misses and gets hit on the body

Lyon is run out pushing for three! Oh no! Short drag down, he's back pulling this off the bottom edge to fine leg, Sandeep runs a long way around to make the save, they push for three, Lyon is struggling, he dives, the bat bounces short of the line, his bat is over the line but in the air when Handscomb takes the bails off! Another horror dismissal!
full toss outside off, he drives easily to deep cover-point
leg break outside off, he leans out and defends on the front foot
dropped at cover! Hard chance. Really tough. Full outside off and he hammer a drive in the air at cover, Bird jumps up and gets hands to it but can't hang on, they get two
full into leg stump, he defends to midwicket
quicker and shorter on off, he's back and defending
leg break on off, he defends from the crease in hope, and it hits the middle of the bat
tossed up outside off, he lofts a drive inside out over cover! What a shot from Pope! He hit that beautifully
full on off, he defends on the front foot to cover
caught at cover! Tossed up on off, he just chips a drive straight to cover and the catch is taken easily! The Stars pull off a stunning performance!
